main event: Multiple witnesses reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object in Cincinnati, Ohio on March 2, 1961, describing it as a bright streak in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 25 seconds to 5 minutes, Witnesses described the object as having a luminous trail, It was observed moving at high speeds, Several reports indicated similar sightings around the same time and location, One observation also noted an effect on a geiger counter suggesting a potentially radioactive nature of the object.
sighted object: A bright streak of light in the sky
witness description: Civilians, including employees of General Electric, including various observations from different locations in the Cincinnati area.
